response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We understand its significance to you and propose a special offer at a price of $14,000. This represents a significant saving compared to the market value, while still allowing us to fairly compensate for the product's worth. We hope this proposal aligns with your expectations and budget. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 14000}
